name: Undying Soldier
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t silvered
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Illumination: The soldier magically sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The soldier can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action.
traits.Turn Resistance: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.
